snippet: Joe Torre, who had been an executive in charge of baseball operations for Major League Baseball, is involved with a group that wants to buy the Los Angeles Dodgers.
abstract: Joe Torre, who had been an executive in charge of baseball operations for Major League Baseball, is involved with a group that wants to buy the Los Angeles Dodgers.

headline.main: Torre Resigns to Pursue Dodgers Deal
headline.print_headline: Torre Resigns to Join Group Seeking to Buy Dodgers
